creating the equity trends for portfolio

Source: R/pq_portfolio.R
pq_portfolio.Rd

pq_portfolio creates the equity trends of a portfolio secturites.

pq_portfolio(dt, w, x = "close", init_equity = NULL, date_range = "max",
  from = NULL, to = Sys.Date())

Arguments

dt

a list/dataframe of time series dataset
w

a dataframe of position and price of all transactions.
x

the name of column to calculate. Default is 'close|value'.
init_equity

initial equity
date_range

date range. Available value includes '1m'-'11m', 'ytd', 'max' and '1y'-'ny'. Default is max.
from

the start date. Default is NULL. If it is NULL, then calculate using date_range and end date.
to

the end date. Default is the current date.

Examples

# \donttest{
dat = md_stock(c('FB', 'AMZN', 'AAPL', 'NFLX', 'GOOG'), date_range = 'max')

#> 1/5 FB
#> 2/5 AMZN
#> 3/5 AAPL
#> 4/5 NFLX
#> 5/5 GOOG
w = data.frame(
      date = c('2016-01-08'),
      symbol = c('FB', 'AMZN', 'AAPL', 'NFLX', 'GOOG'),
      price = c(99.88, 618.88, 97.88, 115.88, 716.88),
      position = c(100, 200, 300, 400, 500),
      type = rep('buy_op', 5)
    )
pf = pq_portfolio(dat, w)
# }
